sentences.sContent: ...finds that the best way to ensure employees are “engaged” is to give them more control over where and how they do their work―which may mean liberating them from having to do everything in collaboration with others...
...he quotes Google co-founder Larry Page to the effect that the perfect search engine will understand exactly what i mean and give me back exactly what i want...
...A commentary in the Shanghai Daily points out that innovation doesn't mean piles of documents...
...What do you mean by geographical problems...
...what I mean is the area is very hilly...
...M：I open the store when I want and leave when I want.W: You mean you don’t keep regular hours...
...red does not always mean luckiness and happiness because in the past names of the dead were often written in red...
...people - I mean strangers - speak to you on the street or on the train...
...recent developments in electric vehicle technology mean they can match conventional petrol engines in terms of performance and safety...

...What it does mean is that the book business will go through a transformation in the next decade or so more profound than any it has seen since Gutenberg introduced printing from moveable type in the 1450s...

phrases.pCn: n. 平均时间（平均太阳时）
均方误差；中误差；均方差
中庸之道；[美]黄金分割（等于golden section）
平均直径；中径；二次平均直径

words.tran: 有意义地；意味深长地；有意图地
小气鬼；刻薄鬼；卑鄙家伙

trans.tranOther: If you want to know what a word, code, signal, or gesture means, you want to know what it refers to or what its message is
